description:
Use a combination of electrofishing and various traps to assess trends in a variety of fish population metrics including abundance, CPUE, condition, growth, species composition and other when / where appropriate.

Electrofishing will be performed in the fall (August / September) to assess trends in abundance / CPUE . condition and relative composition of various fish species (trout, whitefish, others depending on river section).  This sampling technique will be used in all sections.

Hoop trapping will be performed in the winter (December - February) to assess trends in the burbot population in the tailrace of Libby Dam (Dam-Fisher section only).

userSamples.name: BPA Sample for Study Design MFWP Fish Population Monitoring - Large Rivers WSE 94789 (7885)

title: Kootenai River fish abundance and CPUE - Montana Fish, Wildlife and Parks (MFWP)
